body: $AAPL tim cook finally becomes a billionaire congrats tim
Also $aapl $f $msft and $tgt added to chart potpourri

$SPY $AAPL $TSLA 

Market participants are bracing for another historically hot reading on inflation in the latest CPI data, due out on Wednesday. On a year-over-year basis, consumer prices likely surged by 7.1% in December, based on Bloomberg consensus data, accelerating even further from November's 6.8% year-over-year clip. This would mark the fastest rate since 1982, when CPI rose as much as 8.4% on a year-over-year basis.  - Yahoo

links.title: Gurman: New iPhone SE and More Likely at Apple Event in March or April
links.description: Apple plans to hold a virtual event in March or April, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman said today in the latest edition of his "Power On" newsletter. Gurman said a new iPhone SE with support for 5G and a faster chip is likely to be among the announcements at the event.
